title: Forced log out
body:
Hey guys,
 Im having an issue with league latley,
I can queue champion pick and load but when it comes to actual gameplay 1-3 minutes i get a forced log out then i get a leavebuster which is a pain in the butt, ive tried support and that was no help can anyone help me fix this please?

replies.body: It sounds like you have a network problem that's having trouble keeping a stable connection to the game server.  Use the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help troubleshoot this towards a fix.  Let me know if you have any questions!
